Trusted By

Values

Frictionless Data

Our process, steeped in user-centered design, will ditch confusing interfaces and optimize your time spent collecting and analyzing data.

Useful Data

No more black boxes. Our dynamic systems engage staff on all levels through linked, transparent, and accessible data.

Local Data

We know Albertan privacy legislation and are trained in First Nations Information Governance Centre’s OCAP principles. All data is hosted in secure Canadian Microsoft datacenters.

We're committed to affordability.

We know that unallocated funds in mission driven organizations are rare. Here’s how we prioritize affordability:

Low overhead

Volunteering for office space and hosting our site on Github are just some of the ways we keep our monthly burn near zero.

Discounts

We’ve chosen Microsoft tech because of the hearty non-profit discounts they give. Licensing for a team of 15 can be less than $95 monthly. Other leading competitors will charge $100/user/month.

Exact fit

With our app-based approach we build only what you need. That's easier for both of us.


You dream it, we build it.
